title: `[aria-*]` attributes do not match their roles
description: Each ARIA `role` supports a specific subset of `aria-*` attributes. Mismatching these invalidates the `aria-*` attributes. [Learn more](https://web.dev/aria-allowed-attr/).

node.snippet: <li tabindex="0" class="ui-tabs-tab ui-corner-top ui-state-default ui-tab ui-tabs-active ui-state-â€¦" aria-controls="census-and-cross-reference-data" aria-labelledby="ui-id-1" aria-selected="true" aria-expanded="true">
node.explanation:
Fix any of the following:
  ARIA attribute is not allowed: aria-selected="true"
